text:
Hi <@U7SL518D6>, <@UFDUSH7FV>, <@U0133U3RYE8>. Just done a search now and found your conversations r.e `customerPayload.main is not a function` .

Was any solution or understanding of the problem attained? Getting it now on a serverless function which I need external dependencies for, meaning I have to use webpack.

Hey developers!

If we did a workshop/webinar on Serverless Functions, what would folks want to see? What would they want to learn? What sort of examples would be valuable for you all? Thanks!

using node to connect the dots on inner HubSpot endpoints.
Example:
Deal Creation to HubDB
Contact Update to HubDB
Running a Workflow on a Contact or Deal
Associate Deal to Contact
